remarks: Properties that determine the greatest lower bound of a complete lattice.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Mar-2014.)
statement:
isglbd.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
isglbd.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
isglbd.g $e |- G = ( glb ` K ) $.
isglbd.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ y e. S ) -> H .<_ y ) $.
isglbd.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. B /\ A. y e. S x .<_ y ) -> x .<_ H ) $.
isglbd.3 $e |- ( ph -> K e. CLat ) $.
isglbd.4 $e |- ( ph -> S C_ B ) $.
isglbd.5 $e |- ( ph -> H e. B ) $.
isglbd $p |- ( ph -> ( G ` S ) = H ) $.
$d B x $.
$d H x y $.
$d K x y $.
$d S x y $.
$d ph x y $.
